basic.name: Drag (Q)
basic.description: Dehaka lashes out his tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, Stunning and dragging them with him for 1.75 seconds.If Dehaka is Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

basic.name: Dark Swarm (W)
basic.description: Deal 52 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

basic.name: Burrow (E)
basic.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While Burrowed, Dehaka can move at 50% movement speed.

heroic.name: Isolation (R)
heroic.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Adaptation (R)
heroic.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

trait.name: Essence Collection (T)
trait.description: Heal Dehaka for a small amount per stored Essence over 5 seconds. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.Passive: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Maximum of 50 Essence.

1.name: Enduring Swarm
1.description: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

1.name: Tissue Regeneration
1.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

1.name: Enhanced Agility
1.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

4.name: Lurker Strain
4.description: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and knocks nearby enemies back, dealing 125 damage and Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 3 seconds.

4.name: One-Who-Collects
4.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%. Dark Swarm deals 40% more damage to Mercenaries.

4.name: Hero Stalker
4.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

7.name: Feeding Frenzy
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.Passive: Increase Drag's duration by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
7.description: Drag Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds after it ends.Gambit: When Drag ends, deal an additional 280 damage to the target over 2 seconds. Every death reduces this damage by 40, up to 5 times.

7.name: Symbiosis
7.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

10.name: Isolation
10.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

10.name: Adaptation
10.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

13.name: Ferocious Stalker
13.description: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 60% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

13.name: Primal Swarm
13.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

13.name: Primal Rage
13.description: Gain 1.25% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

16.name: Tunneling Claws
16.description: Increase movement speed while Burrowing to 125%.

16.name: Pack Leader
16.description: Dehaka gains 20 Armor and 15% increased Attack Speed while in a bush and for 5 seconds after leaving.

20.name: Contagion
20.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

20.name: Change Is Survival
20.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Essence Claws
20.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

20.name: Apex Predator
20.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 50 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.
